channel.title: Gear-to-Buy on Ksbigbass
channel.description: Recent content in Gear-to-Buy on Ksbigbass

item.title: MLF Fishing Scale
item.description:
Fishing Scale: ElectroSamson Brecknell 

The MLF fishing scale: If you were wondering what that scale really looked like? This is the scale that has made the quick catch and release style tournament fishing the success it is. Now any club that wants to try and create their own MLF style tournament knows where to start.

[]

If you like the way the MLF weighs the fish and then immediately releases it, then you are a fan of this scale.

item.title: A Better Ned Head
item.description:
A Better Ned Head, seems like we are all looking for a better Ned Rig setup. We’ve all been there. That little TRD worm catches a giant bass and the hook bends, breaks, or is too small and we lose the fish of a lifetime.

Berkley Half Head is rapidly becoming a goto in my tackle box.

Berkley Half Head Fishing Jigs

item.title: NRX 803S JWR Drop Shot Rod
item.description:
The G. Loomis NRX 803S JWR drop shot rod and the NRX 852S JWR  have been awesome additions to my arsenal.

Both have enough flex in the tip and the right parabolic bend to launch light drop shot rigs into the wind when it’s needed but these are drop shot specific rods.

Weightless Worms

They are not the best for ned rigs or shaky heads. Grab a Mossyback or something else for that presentation that needs a hookset. These rods take surges of a fish very well, absorbs the shock immensely well.

item.title: Go Eat a Bird!!!
item.description:
Go Eat a Bird!!! Bought a Save Phace now I am glad I did after reading a friends blog.

The story goes like this. Guy has a fast bass boat like a lot of us do. Running loaded down fairly well on a lake with heavy boat traffic that day. The pair were flying down the lake headed off to the next spot. That is when a group of coots surprisingly came out of nowhere. One of the biggest and slowest birds hit the trolling motor with the boat going about 70 miles and hour. Another bird hit the console and then hit the driver directly in the face.

item.title: Underspin: Here's a better look
item.description:
Underspin. Here’s a better look. Turns out I was ahead of the curve on this one.

Casey Ashley won the Bassmaster Classic on a very similar bait.

item.title: The Meat.
item.description:
The Meat.

Today : May 7, 2011 2:53 am

I fished for 2 hrs today in the afternoon.  The weather was the normal 25-40 mph South winds and a warm 76 degrees.
